EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF 1.6 Launch_Q415.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: See you in a few hours!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We are looking forward to seeing you at today's webinar Expand Your Cloud Native Platform's Capabilities With The Newest Release of Pivotal Cloud Foundry at 10:00AM PST. Please see event details below:
Date: Today, November 19, 2015 Time: 10AM PST- 1:00PM EST Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1084533/BADF02F8BC6EB0B824A341447DFA9647> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
See you in a few hours!
The Pivotal Team
